info.title: Rippletide API
info.description:
Rippletide is a platform for building hallucination-free conversational AI agents.
    This API allows you to manage your agents, knowledge base, and more.

get.summary: List all agents in the workspace

schema.title: Response Get All Agents Api Sdk Agent Get

get.summary: Get a specific agent by ID
Get user input collection for an agent

post.summary: Create user input collection for an agent

get.summary: Get summary of an agent
List all QAndAs in the workspace
Get a specific QAndA by ID
List all QAndAs used by a specific agent
Get a specific action by ID
List all actions for a specific agent
Get All Tags
Get Tag

delete.description: Delete a tag within the current workspace

get.summary: List all QAndA-tag relationships in the workspace
get.description:
Retrieve all QAndA-tag relationships in the current workspace.

Args:
    pg_session: Database session dependency
    request: FastAPI request object for workspace context

Returns:
    dict: Dictionary containing a list of all QAndA-tag relationships

get.summary: List all tags for a specific QAndA
get.description:
Retrieve all tags associated with a specific QAndA.

Args:
    q_and_a_id: UUID of the QAndA
    pg_session: Database session dependency
    request: FastAPI request object for workspace context

Returns:
    dict: Dictionary containing a list of tags for the specified QAndA

Raises:
    HTTPException: 404 if the QAndA is not found or not accessible

get.summary: List all QAndAs for a specific tag
get.description:
Retrieve all QAndAs associated with a specific tag.

Args:
    tag_id: UUID of the tag
    pg_session: Database session dependency
    request: FastAPI request object for workspace context

Returns:
    dict: Dictionary containing a list of QAndAs for the specified tag

Raises:
    HTTPException: 404 if the tag is not found or not accessible

schema.title: Response Get Q And A For Tag Api Sdk Q And A Tag Tag  Tag Id  Get

delete.summary: Delete an QAndA-tag relationship by ID
Delete an QAndA-tag relationship by QAndA and tag IDs

get.summary: List all existing guardrails
Get a specific guardrail by ID
List all guardrails for a specific agent
Get State Predicate

post.summary: Send a message to an agent and gets the response

get.summary: Get list of chat runs/conversations
get.description: Get a list of all chat runs/conversations.

schema.title: Response Get Chat Runs Api Sdk Chat Runs Get

get.summary: Get chat runs for a specific agent
get.description: Get a list of chat runs/conversations for a specific agent.

schema.title: Response Get Chat Runs For Agent Api Sdk Chat Agent  Agent Id  Runs Get

get.summary: Get detailed chat run data
get.description: Get detailed information about a specific chat run including messages and steps.

get.summary: Get chat messages for a run
get.description: Get all chat messages for a specific run.

schema.title: Response Get Chat Messages Api Sdk Chat Runs  Run Id  Messages Get

post.summary: [experimental] Integration of Langchain and LangGraph. Enable seamless use of Rippletide instead of a LLM

post.description: Add guardrail variable for a specific agent
Get guardrail variable for a specific agent
Add format answer for a specific agent
Get format answer for a specific agent

get.summary: Get Tool Calls For Agent
get.description: Get all tool calls for a specific agent

delete.summary: Delete all tool calls for an agent
delete.description: Delete all tool calls for a specific agent

post.description:
Proxy endpoint to test tool API calls server-side to avoid CORS issues.

Expected request body:
{
    "url": "https://api.example.com/endpoint",
    "method": "GET",
    "headers": {"x-api-key": "..."},
    "body": {"param": "value"}  # Will be converted to query params for GET
}

tags.name: Agent
tags.description: Manage your conversational AI agents. Create, retrieve, update, and delete agents that will handle user interactions.

tags.name: QAndA
tags.description: Questions And Answers (QAndAs) are used by your agent to answers user's questions. QAndAs are used as the only source of truth by the agent in order to avoid hallucination. QAndAs can be organized with tags for better categorization and retrieval.

tags.name: Tag
tags.description: Organize your knowledge base content with tags. Tags can be applied to QAndAs to enable more sophisticated content organization and retrieval.

tags.name: Guardrails
tags.description: Define guardrails to ensure your agents operate within predefined boundaries. Guardrails help maintain consistency and safety in agent responses

tags.name: State Predicate
tags.description: Configure and manage what your agent can do given the information it has so far. State predicates also indicate the agent which information to ask the user

tags.name: QAndA Tag
tags.description: Create and manage relationships between QAndAs and tags.

tags.name: Chat
tags.description: The route your users user to interact with your agents. Send messages to an agent and receive a response based on their configuration and knowledge base

tags.name: Langchain
tags.description: Endpoints that can be used to replace LLM calls in Langchain

tags.name: Action
tags.description: Create and manage actions that your agents can perform.

tags.name: Evaluation
tags.description: Create new evaluation of the agent

tags.name: Evaluation Questions
tags.description: Manage question to evaluate an agent

tags.name: Evaluation Executions
tags.description: Run one agent evaluation and look at results
